sect1.title: General
sect1.para:
This module implements DWAX_Diagnosis which contains two components: Adaptions and MeasurementValues.
Adaptions component was created to handle diagnostic requests for certain DIDs of the DWASensorSirene composition and it is used to perform the read(22 service) - write(2E service) operations at system level. MeasurementValues main purpose is to read data using 22 service, get the data from different application and BSW component and give it to the tester.
This module is generated using Diagnose_ODX STRs delivered by VW as shown below:
